name: Soccer Penatly Shootout Match
description:
This is the Champions League knockout.

It's time to play penatly shootout. pick your team and play against the rest of the
Europe in this amazing soccer game.Try to win every match or you'll be knockout and Missed Champions League.

=How to play?=

* To shoot, touch and hold the screen on you device. Release to make a kick .
* To save , press and hold and release when you're ready to dive .

Have Fun!
